## setLanguage() function

Configure the browser's language.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function setLanguage(page: Page, lang: string | string[]): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  page | Page | The puppeteer page handle. |
|  lang | string \| string\[\] | Either be a single string (e.g. "en") or an array of supported languages (e.g. <code>['de-DE', 'en-US', 'gr']</code>) |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
